text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) VoltAgent/awesome-openclaw-skills | 95% | stars now 6471 → est 14271 (range 14234-14308)
   https://github.com/VoltAgent/awesome-openclaw-skills
2) cloudflare/moltworker | 95% | stars now 5781 → est 15202 (range 15169-15235)
   https://github.com/cloudflare/moltworker
3) gavrielc/nanoclaw | 94% | stars now 1100 → est 7279 (range 7254-7304)
   https://github.com/gavrielc/nanoclaw
4) lukilabs/beautiful-mermaid | 93% | stars now 5244 → est 15925 (range 15880-15970)
   https://github.com/lukilabs/beautiful-mermaid
5) Robbyant/lingbot-world | 93% | stars now 1905 → est 5416 (range 5391-5441)
   https://github.com/Robbyant/lingbot-world

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
